org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic
Class AbstractBusinessLogic

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic.AbstractBusinessLogic
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractEventBusinessLogic, CaptureBusinessLogic, RESTfulEPCISBusinessLogic
public abstract class AbstractBusinessLogic
extends Object

Class containing helper methods to initialize the Resources. Encapsulates common EPCISResource handling logic.

Author:
Mathias Mueller mathias.mueller(at)unifr.ch
